name: Extendable Baton
description: A handy dandy extendable baton. This deals 2 damage and doesn't require proficiency to use.

name: Knife
description: Deals 2 damage + DEXTROUS (1 damage on SNAG) and doesn't require proficiency to use.

name: Brass Knuckles
description: Adds +1 to what would otherwise be unarmed damage.

name: Crystal Charge x 5
description: Ammo used in a magical ranged weapon. Each shot fired consumes 1 AMMO on a SNAG or FAILURE.

name: Tazer
description: Can be used to try to stun someone. Make a melee attack roll against an afflictable target. On a SUCCESS, the target is stunned. The next roll against them HAS LEVERAGE. (1 damage on SNAG).
Requires magical ammo.

name: Nunchucks
description: A great weapon for a skilled martial artist. Tricky to use though. Deals MARTIAL + DEXTROUS damage on SUCCESS. Deals 1d4 damage on SNAG.

name: Staff
description: A quality staff can be used well by a skilled martial artist. Deals 2 + MARTIAL damage. (Deals 2 Damage on SNAG)

name: Silver Knuckles
description: Adds +2 to what would otherwise be unarmed damage.

name: Sword
description: A standard sword deals 2 damage + MARTIAL or STRONG. (2 damage on SNAG)

name: Crystal Pistol
description: A magic powered gun that can deals 6 damage (1d6 on SNAG). Requires proficiency to use without LOSING LEVERAGE.
Requires magical ammo.

name: Auto-Magic Rifle
description: Deals 1d8 damage on SUCCESS (1d4 on SNAG).
Requires magical ammo.

name: Longsword
description: Deal 3 damage (1d4 on SNAG). Add STRONG on SUCCESS.

name: Crystal Rifle
description: A magic powered rifle that can shoot targets over far distances. Deals 6 damage (1d4 on SNAG). Add DEXTROUS to damage when shooting targets further than the THROWN, range.
Requires magical ammo.

name: Scythe
description: Deals 4 + MARTIAL & STRONG. (Deals 2 + STRONG on SNAG)

name: Crystal Sword
description: A clear crystalline hilt with no blade until magic is funneled into the weapon (which can be done at will and only if your MAGICAL ATTRIBUTE is more than 0).

Magic can be funneled at will or imbued. When this is done, a thin neon beam of mana in a color of your choosing extends from your blade. The thickness can vary but the length stays the same and matches the length of a standard sword.
Does 4 damage + MAGICAL and MARTIAL or 4 damage + MAGICAL & DEXTROUS on SUCCESS (1d4 damage only on SNAG).
